title: Disney's very merry Christmas songs
brief_description: Join your favourite Disney characters in these traditional Christmas songs including “Deck the Halls”, “Jingle Bells”, “Joy to the World”, “Let it Snow!”, “Sleigh Ride”, “Parade of the Wooden Soldiers”, “Winter Wonderland”, “Here Comes Santa Claus”, “Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer”, “Silent Night” and “We Wish You a Merry Christmas”. The words of the carols appear on screen so you can sing along.
